parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.50

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns unit's knowledge about target. The returned array includes information whether the target is 
# known by group
# known by the unit
# last time the target was seen by the unit
# last time the target endangered the unit
# target side
# position error
# target position

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit '''targetKnowledge''' target

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> target: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] (7 elements)
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_allInfo = _soldierOne [[targetKnowledge]] _jeepOne;</code>
</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> <code>_posError = (_soldierOne [[targetKnowledge]] _jeepOne) [[select]] 5;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[knowsAbout]], [[targetsQuery]], [[targetsAggregate]], [[nearTargets]], [[reveal]], [[getHideFrom]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">



<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
